Semantic Search: Finding Exactly What They Mean ğŸ”

Traditional search fails on synonyms, misspellings, and conceptual searches. Semantic search understands that "trainers," "runners," and "sneakers" are the same product type, ensuring that customers always see relevant results, even with complex or vague queries, maximizing conversion and sales.

Dynamic Content Personalization: Recommendation Engines ğŸ¤–

This goes beyond simple recommendations. It involves using AI to continuously adapt the entire page layout, CTAs (Call-to-Action), and product visibility based on the user's real-time behavior, past history, and inferred intent. Machine Learning (ML) models analyze user data (clicks, dwell time, purchase history, etc.) to predict what content or product will maximize engagement or conversion for that specific user.

website usage: E-commerce, media/publishing, SaaS
